title: Why are hospital blankets so thin? - Quora

response.answer_text: I empathise with the misery of thin blankets. If you are visiting someone in the Emergency Room or ICU, ask for “warm blankets”. There are blanket warmers which produce lovely warm (though thin) blankets. I loved when a nurse put a warm blanket on me, then the other cold blankets on top to keep the warmth close to my skin.

It will be difficult for the patient to handle heavy blankets and its weight. So they intentionally keep it thin and handy. Moreover, it depends on the price, the hospitals are willing to pay for it. We keep a wide variety of blankets of different brands and are into this business since 1964 in Old Delhi. We recommend you to visit us once to know it better.
